child_dialogue_devanagari.description: The child's dialogue in Devanagari script (e.g., 'पापा, मुझे अभी चाहिए!'). MUST be output FIRST. (1 sentence, visceral and simple, from the child's perspective)

child_dialogue.description: The child's dialogue in Romanized Hindi (Hindi written in English letters, e.g., 'Papa, mujhe abhi chahiye!') (1 sentence, visceral and simple, from the child's perspective)

what_child_heard.description: The meaning the child extracted from the parent's words (1 sentence, visceral and simple, from the child's perspective)

child_inner_feeling.description: What the child is actually feeling but can't articulate - Romanized Hindi

is_resolved.description: Current state: ongoing = keep going, resolution = child re-engaged, meltdown = child beyond reach
